message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more to you than $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer of $825000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $775000, but that's as high as I can go. I really believe this product is valuable, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

I understand your constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $775000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer, this time at $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to meet you at this point.
